summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Ethics and Elections Commission; providing for closed hearings on Ethics Code charges upon request of certain City employees, but providing for charges and decisions to be made public if a violation is found; authorizing and making provisions for appeals to Seattle Municipal Court of certain fines imposed by the Commission for violation of the Code of Ethics; making technical corrections; and amending sections 4.16.030, 4.16.090, and 4.16.100 of the Seattle Municipal Code in connection therewith.
